title: Provided that, for (a) and (b) above maximum distance shall be subject to 16
clause_text: Provided that, for (a) and (b) above maximum distance shall be subject to 16.0 m. If the owner wishes to provide chowk size more than what is prescribed above, it shall be allowed.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
